content: Phase 3.1: Implement JWT Authentication + Google OAuth
Phase 3.2: Build AI Chatbot automation (embeddable widget + backend)
Phase 3.3: Build Lead Capture automation (forms + auto-response)
Phase 3.5: Enhance orchestrator with async execution and retry logic
Phase 4.2: Integrate Stripe billing and subscriptions
Phase 6.2: Build Analytics Dashboard with key metrics
Update all APIs to require authentication
Create usage tracking and plan limits enforcement
Test complete flow: Auth → Create Automation → Billing → Analytics
